headline: Campbell’s Snacks Shakeup Puts Mohit Anand In Focus For Investors
summary: Campbell's (NasdaqGS:CPB) has appointed Mohit Anand as Executive Vice President and President of its Snacks division. The leadership change comes as the company works to revitalize sales in its snacks business. Anand brings extensive food and beverage industry experience to one of Campbell's key segments. For investors watching Campbell's at a share price of $26.95, this move follows a challenging stretch. The stock is down 29.3% over the past year and 42.3% over 3 years, with a 30.9%...
